name: The Sistine Chapel: History, Imagery, Usage
description: The Sistine Chapel in Rome is a historical artifact, an artistic monument, and a house of worshipâ€”at once recognizable and mystifying. This seminar explores fifteenth-century origins, decoration by some of the most accomplished artists of the Italian renaissance, and continuing use (especially the election of popes). Topics will include: art and patronage, rhetoric and ritual, controversial restoration, and the Sistine Chapel in popular cultureâ€”with an emphasis on the close analysis of the major frescoes.
